Package net.sourceforge.plantuml.klimt.awt

Class XAffineTransform

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.plantuml.klimt.awt.XAffineTransform
public class XAffineTransform extends Object
Affine transformation matrix implementation compatible with both standard JVM and TeaVM environments.

The transformation matrix is represented as: 

 [ m00  m01  m02 ]   [ x ]   [ m00*x + m01*y + m02 ]
 [ m10  m11  m12 ] * [ y ] = [ m10*x + m11*y + m12 ]
 [  0    0    1  ]   [ 1 ]   [          1          ]

Where:

  • m00, m11 = scale factors (scaleX, scaleY)
  • m01, m10 = shear/rotation factors
  • m02, m12 = translation factors (translateX, translateY)

  • Constructor Details

    • XAffineTransform

      public XAffineTransform(double m00, double m10, double m01, double m11, double m02, double m12)
      Creates a transform from the 6 specified values.
      Parameters:
      m00 - the X coordinate scaling element
      m10 - the Y coordinate shearing element
      m01 - the X coordinate shearing element
      m11 - the Y coordinate scaling element
      m02 - the X coordinate translation element
      m12 - the Y coordinate translation element

    • concatenate

      public void concatenate(XAffineTransform other)
      Concatenates another transform to this transform.

      This is equivalent to: [this] = [this] * [other]

      Parameters:
      other - the transform to concatenate
